name: Visit North Spain
summary: An immersive 360-degree 3D journey along the stunning northern coast of Spain. A VR app that transports you not only to the vibrant cities of Santander and Gijón but all the beaches, cliffs, pilgrim destinations and viewpoints, worth visiting along the way. Designed for travelers, culture enthusiasts, and adventure seekers, this app offers an unparalleled virtual exploration of 40 iconic locations, complete with 132 viewable video hotspots that reveal hidden stories, local flavors, and breathtaking vistas.
